body_html:
Thanks @mckinziebrandon for your kind reply!

I've checked my return output for list_local_devices and it indeed says /cpu:0. For the coord.join() part. I'm using slim.learning.train for my training. The implementation includes sv.start_queue_runners(sess).
body_text:
Thanks @mckinziebrandon for your kind reply!
I've checked my return output for list_local_devices and it indeed says /cpu:0. For the coord.join() part. I'm using slim.learning.train for my training. The implementation includes sv.start_queue_runners(sess).
body:
Thanks @mckinziebrandon for your kind reply! 

I've checked my return output for `list_local_devices` and it indeed says `/cpu:0`. For the `coord.join()` part. I'm using `slim.learning.train` for my training. The implementation includes [sv.start_queue_runners(sess)](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim/learning.py#L738).
